mapper.insert: insert into o2o.tb_shop_info(owner_id, area_id, shop_category_id, shop_name, shop_desc, shop_address, shop_phone, shop_priority, shop_img_url, create_time, update_time, advice) values(#{master.userId}, #{campusArea.campusAreaId}, #{category.shopCategoryId}, #{shopName}, #{description}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{priority}, #{imageURL}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{advice})
mapper.select: select tb_shop_info.*, tb_shop_category.shop_category_id, tb_shop_category.shop_category_name, tb_campusarea.campusarea_id, tb_campusarea.campusarea_name from o2o.tb_shop_info inner join o2o.tb_shop_category on tb_shop_info.shop_category_id = tb_shop_category.shop_category_id inner join o2o.tb_campusarea on tb_shop_info.area_id = tb_campusarea.campusarea_id where shop_id = #{id};
